text: The Sin (, translit. Al Haram) is a 1965 Egyptian drama movie directed by Henry Barakat and is based on the novel of the same name by Yusuf Idris. It stars Faten Hamama, Zaki Rostom, Abdullah Gaith and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. == Other websites == * Category:1965 drama movies Category:Egyptian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Henry Barakat
title: The Sin (1965 movie)
